cleaned_text: First of all, it is important to note that your sex life does not depend on supplements. Various other factors can both positively and negatively affect your sex life. Exercise, weight and medications you take can have both adverse and positive effects. Try to improve your sex life by altering these aspects before you use supplements. Nevertheless, here are some supplements which may be beneficial for your sex life. 1. [Iron](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/iron-benefits-sources-and-side-effects) Iron is used to boost the libido of women. The libido comprises the arousal, desire as well as the ability to have an orgasm. However, too much iron is not good for you. Over 20 mg can cause stomach problems and [constipation](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/constipation) while over 60 mg is life threatening. 2. [Niacin](https://www.lybrate.com/medicine/niacin) There are two types of cholesterol in your body. One is a good cholesterol while the other is a bad cholesterol. Niacin is a type of B vitamin which raises your good cholesterol level. Men who have [high cholesterol](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/high-cholesterol) and [erectile dysfunction](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/erectile-dysfunction) tend to see improvements in their symptoms by taking 1500 mg of niacin for 12 weeks. 3. Yohimbine This is a type of herbal supplement only used for men. It is used to treat erectile dysfunction and should only be used on men. However, it is worth note that [high blood pressure](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/high-blood-pressure), heart [palpitations](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/palpitations), [anxiety](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/anxiety), [headaches](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/headaches) and [dizziness](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/dizziness) are all caused by yohimbine. Therefore, it should be used with care only when the doctor prescribes it. 4. Panax [ginseng](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/benefits-of-ginseng-and-its-side-effects) This is one of those rare drugs which raises sexual desire in women and also corrects erectile dysfunction in men as well. It is worth mentioning that panax ginseng also causes [insomnia](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/insomnia). Insomnia is one of the side effects of this medication along with diarrhea and [painful periods](https://www.lybrate.com/treatment-for-painful-periods) for women. 5. Maca This is a type of Peruvian root vegetable. It primarily helps women who are taking antidepressants and have lost their sex drive as a result. It can also be tried safely as it is a type of food as well and therefore it is not as dangerous as some of the other supplements on this list. [Hair loss](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/hair-loss) does not affect a person's physical health but it can be detrimental to their mental health. Thankfully, this condition can be treated. [Hair transplant](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/hair-transplant) refers to a procedure by which hair follicles from a donor area are transplanted to a bald site. In most cases, the donor area refers to the back of the head. This can be used to treat significant thinning of the hair, [baldness](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/baldness) and hair loss for both men and women. Some of the advantages of a hair transplant procedure are: Hair Transplant is Natural As compared to hair [implants](https://www.lybrate.com/doctors-for-implants), a transplant procedure is completely natural and uses hair follicles from the patient's own head. Once the hair follicles have been transferred, they begin to grow naturally. No chemicals that may damage your hair are used in this process. Thus, it is much safer and your body will not reject the transplanted hair follicles. Low Maintenance Once the transplanted hair follicles root themselves in your scalp, they will grow like the rest of your hair. This is easily manageable and no special shampoos or chemicals are required to maintain its look. You can also have a haircut and style your hair normally. Natural Look Since the hair follicles used for the transplant are taken from the patient's own body, the transplanted hair look and feel natural. Unlike hairpieces and wigs, this does not look artificial. In fact, by the time your hair begins to grow, the transplanted area will look like the rest of your head and people will not be able to tell the difference. Better Self-Esteem Balding can cause a lot of self-esteem issues. A hair transplant is a one-time procedure that can cover bald patches and give you a more youthful appearance. Along with making you look good; this also improves your sense of self-worth and gives a person more confidence. Thus, it improves the overall mental and emotional health of a person. Cost Effective A hair transplant procedure is a one time cost. With this procedure, there is no need to visit a doctor over and over again. It also negates the need for special chemicals and shampoos. You can style your hair as you would normally thus keeping you from needing to buy wigs etc. Also, the effects of a [hair transplant surgery](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/hair-transplant-surgery) are permanent. Though the cost of the procedure may seem high at the time, in the long run, it is cost effective and budget friendly.
